short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find the 'Most Thanked' posts in a thread with the click of a mouse!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***This is a simple extension for use with www.boards.ie***

HOW TO USE:
- Install extension.
- Browse to any thread page.
- Click on the thumb icon which will appear on the top right of your screen in the address bar.

The extension will then open a new tab which shows a list of the most thanked posts in that thread in descending order.

If you would like to get in contact with the developer, please email fplstatsman@gmail.com.
